title: Consider Visual Impairments
text: Visual impairments can make it difficult to see images and graphs.

title: Alternative Text Importance
text: Alternative text provides a description of images and graphs for those who cannot see them.

title: Avoiding Visual-Only Information
text: Relying solely on visual information can exclude those with visual impairments.

title: Enhancing Accessibility
text: Providing alternative text ensures that all audience members can access the information.
